text: Tasartha tinaka rabale tinako prarthana svikara garihalyo. Ki timimadhye kartavya garneharuko kamako cahe tyo nara hos va nari, khera phalindaina. Dharma ra punya karyama timiharu apasama eka arka jastai hau, atah juna manisaharu mero nimti aphna gharaharu parityaga gari basa'i sare va aphna gharaharubata niskasita bha'e ra utpidita gari'e ra jasale mero lagi dharmayud'dha gare ra sahida bha'e, niscaya nai ma unaka papaharu nirmula garne chu ra tinala'i tyasto svargama pravesa dinechu, jasamunibata naharaharu bagirakheka chan. (Yo) allahako tarphabata puraskara ho ra allahakaham nai ramro puraskara cha
